page.title: 14THE ORE POOL INN
page.content: THE INN WAS BUILT OVER 378 YEARS AGO,ON AN IRONMINE SHAFT.THE MINE CLOSED IN 1605.THERE USED TO BE A COTTAGE NEXT TO THE PUB,BUT IT WAS DESTROYED IN A STORM IN 1785.THE PRESENT BUILDING HAS NOT CHANGED MUCH.THERE ARE STILL MANY WOODEN CEILING BEAMS.THE KITCHEN IS HALF UNDERGROUND.THE PUB HAS 3 ACRES OF LAND,PART OF WHICH IS A BEER GARDEN & AN ORCHARD ,WITH 17 PLUMTREES &2 APPLETREES.I LIKE LIVING AT THE INN,I AM PHILIP LEADBEATER.MY MUM IS THE LICENSEE.IN THIS DAY AND AGE I THINK THAT MANY CHANGES COULD BE MADE TO MAKE LIFE MORE COMFORTABLE IN THE INN FOR THE FAMILY.THERE ARE FOUR OF US,MYSELF,MUM &MY TWO OLDER BROTHERS. THE INN IS PLEASANTLY SITUATED.
